title: News Hub
description: A full-stack web application that aggregates the latest news from various sources. The site uses HTTP for cost efficiency, as it does not collect or handle any sensitive user data.

title: Sync Reminder
description: Developed an application that enables automatic event creation and reminders directly from chat applications like Telegram.

title: Hospital Bed Tracker
description: Implemented a scalable backend for patient bed booking with role-based access, automated bed allocation, and unique ID dispatch via email.
